resources.string: S.V.M PUBLIC SCHOOL ARWATAND is located in Berhabad, Giridh. It is established in 2012. S.V.M PUBLIC SCHOOL ARWATAND is an english medium school where class nursery to class 10th are taught,Address of the School is AT-ARWATAND,MAIN ROAD, Jamua - Pachamba Road, Giridih, Jharkhand 815316.
